full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 285-1 Filed 05/20/21 Page 2 of 10 P. Skinner 2/29/16 Brad Edwards Stan Pottinger A. Kramer (notes) BE - rep. Virginia Roberts SP - rep. Virginia Re: Virginia Roberts Camp now lives in Long history of litigation BE Int. re: Jeffrey Epstein was done by local Palm Beach PD = 2005 rounded up apps. 24 girls molested by JE represented about 10 girls JE's mo. w/ adults they'd tell 13 yr. old girl 'come to rich guy's house to give paid massage. JE naked stands in massage & alternate demand of $ sex act (if you want $4, do x). After paid dozen or three dozen BOD-300 finders fee. Victims recruited other victims. Mother complicit & involved PD turned case over to FBI & USAG. Most of girls (approx. 40+) in FL. No flight logs. Issued GT subpoenas Epstein + 4 named co-conspirators Entered into a non-pros w/ guilty plea for state ct. to 2001-2007 prostitution minor the plea. Terminated plea & pros. for sex crimes comm. in FL b/w 2001 - 2007 Jerry Lefkowitz, Jay Lefkowitz, Ken Starr, Roy Black Epstein Martin Weinberg, Guy Lewis - never Jem shared counsel SDFL - at off Palm Beach, Miami Virginia Alex Acosta US Atty. Limited to FL in juris. CONFIDENTIAL SDNY_GM_02742878 DOJ-OGR-00004171
